Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>! Out fishing today, I see.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hey, how about this? Since we're both here,
how about I show you how the truly great go
fishing!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
First, you head out onto the end of the dock and
cast your fishing line into the water.
<PAGE>
Then, when your bobber plunges under the
water, keep reelin' that fish in and don't stop 'til
you've got it!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
By the way, just between you and me, a little
fact all the pros know is...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>The bigger the fish, the harder it is to reel in!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When your bag gets too full of fish, you can just
store the extras in your fridge.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll bet your brain's bursting at the seams trying
to contain the fishing knowledge I just dropped
on you. But think of how much better you'll be! 
<PAGE>
And as a fee for my life-changing fishing
revelations, I think I'll take that fish you just
caught. ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Woohoo! Just scored myself tonight's main
course! I guess you never know what folks'll give
you 'til you ask! ♪
<PAGE>
Heh heh! Thanks, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, keep on fishing and putting my
massive wisdom to good use, okay? See ya! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Haha, I figured you'd say that. It would've made
for a tasty dinner tonight... Oh well.
<PAGE>
Besides, one of the best parts of fishing is eating
what you caught. I guess you can learn that
lesson at the dinner table.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But when my sage fishing advice has you reeling
in fish after fish, be sure to share some with me!
♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Deal? Deal! Anyways, I've gotta run, but I'll see
ya later, <MYNAME>!
